"Welcome to Milk Parlor!!

" "These Terms of Use govern your use of Milk Parlor and provide informaion about the Milk Parlor service, outlined below. When you create a Milk parlor account or use Milk Parlor, you agree these terms.


"
"TERMS AND CONDITIONS

" "• We agree to provide you with the milk Parlor Service.

" "• You have compulsatory provide fresh products.

" "• You can add milk products which are available in your stock.

" "• You have compulsatory ready your order in 30 minuts.

" "• you will get payment end of the month.
